pages.text: $(item)Half Slime Blocks$() are a cool way to create distinct connections for pistons and $(l:redstone/rotator)Rotators$().$(br2)When moved, blocks will stick to the all slime side, but not the all stone side. Only slime blocks and $(item)Half Slime Blocks$() will stick to the half stone half slime side.

$(item)Half Redstone Blocks$() allow one to create direction redstone signals that can be moved by pistons and $(l:redstone/rotator)Rotators$().$(br2)The $(item)Half Redstone Block$() only emits a redstone signal from the all redstone side. Other sides do not emit any signals.
